document.full_text: a judge in ottawa approved the extradition of a suspect in the 1980 bombing of a paris synagogue that killed four people, but said the case was weak.
document.title: |: canada: extradition ordered of suspect in paris synagogue bombing
lines_and_colors: a judge in ottawa approved the extradition of a suspect in the 1980 bombing of a paris synagogue that killed four people, but said the case was weak.
